page.title: 07Science & technology
page.content: In the university there are many departments where graduates, post- graduates and academic staff study scientific subjects. There is also a computer department. At present 180 students are taking a 3 year degree in computing. The administration of the university is run from University House with the help of 2 main computers. From here operators can dial to other computers in other departments. These may be used in the everyday running of departmental work, research or teaching. Students can use 1 computer or banks of 5 or more in teaching areas.Operators from computer services give maintenance.The computer which deals with the payroll has 4 different programmes; 2 monthly salaries(local government & academic), weekly wages & part time. It also deals with student careers & creditors
